mapper.select: SELECT pstg_no, pstg_wrt_id, pstg_wrt_title, pstg_wrt_cn, pstg_wrt_ymd, pstg_inq_cnt FROM pstg WHERE pstg_no = #{pstgNo}
SELECT * FROM cmnt WHERE cmnt_pstg_no = #{pstgNo} ORDER BY cmnt_wrt_ymd asc
SELECT A.atch_no, A.atch_extn_nm, A.atch_file_nm FROM atch A LEFT OUTER JOIN pstg_img B ON A.atch_no = B.pstg_img_atch_no WHERE B.pstg_img_pstg_no = #{pstgNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT into cmnt ( cmnt_no, cmnt_wrt_nm, cmnt_wrt_ymd, cmnt_wrt_cn, cmnt_pstg_no ) VALUES ( cmnt_seq.nextval, #{cmntWrtNm}, sysdate, #{cmntWrtCn}, #{cmntPstgNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cmnt SET cmnt_wrt_cn = #{cmntWrtCn}, cmnt_mdfcn_ymd = sysdate WHERE cmnt_no = #{cmntNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pstg START WITH pstg_parent is NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR pstg_no = pstg_parent ORDER SIBLINGS BY pstg_group DESC, pstg_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pstg ( pstg_no, pstg_wrt_id, pstg_wrt_title, pstg_wrt_cn, pstg_wrt_ymd, pstg_group, pstg_depth, pstg_parent ) SELECT pstg_seq.nextval, #{pstgWrtId}, #{pstgWrtTitle}, #{pstgWrtCn}, sysdate, pstg_group + 1, pstg_depth + 1, #{pstgNo} FROM pstg WHERE pstg_no = #{pstgNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pstg START WITH pstg_no = #{pstgParent} CONNECT BY PRIOR pstg_group = pstg_parent ORDER SIBLINGS BY pstg_group DESC, pstg_parent ASC
